overview.title: Company Overview
overview.businessValue: Web development, System development, Technical consulting, UI/UX design

items.2010: Founded Sample Company Inc. in Chiyoda-ku, Tokyo
items.2025: Reached 50 employees, moved to new office

mission.title: Mission
mission.content: Our mission is to grow our clients' businesses through the power of innovative technology and design.

vision.title: Vision
vision.content: We contribute to a better society through digital technology.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We constantly explore new technologies and methodologies to provide optimal solutions.

quality.title: Commitment to Quality
quality.description: We pay attention to every detail and create high-quality products.

partnership.title: Partnership
partnership.description: We value trust with our customers and grow together.

member1.name: Taro Yamada
member1.description: 15 years of experience in the web industry. Drives projects from both technical and business perspectives.

member2.name: Hanako Sato
member2.description: Leads the technical aspects, leveraging experience from major IT companies.

member3.name: Ichiro Suzuki
member3.description: Provides designs with user experience as the top priority.

office.title: Office
office.subtitle: Our Workplace
office.description: We provide a creative environment in our office equipped with the latest facilities in Chiyoda-ku, Tokyo.
office.accessDescription:

10 minutes walk from Tokyo Station on JR Sobu Line

cta.title: Let's Get Started
cta.description: Feel free to consult with us about your project

webDevelopment.title: Web Development
webDevelopment.description: We create high-quality websites using modern technologies. With responsive design, SEO optimization, and accessibility-focused design, we provide the best user experience.

systemDevelopment.title: System Development
systemDevelopment.description: We develop custom systems to improve business efficiency. With cloud-native design, we build scalable and maintainable systems.

consulting.title: Technical Consulting
consulting.description: We provide consulting on DX promotion, technology selection, architecture design, and more. We propose optimal solutions for your business challenges.

design.title: UI/UX Design
design.description: We design user-friendly and beautiful interfaces with user-centered design. We support everything from user research to prototyping and design system development.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: PRIVACY POLICY
privacy.intro: Sample Company (hereinafter referred to as "the Company") recognizes the importance of protecting customer personal information, complies with the Personal Information Protection Law, and strives for proper handling and protection in accordance with this Privacy Policy.

collection.title: 1. Collection of Personal Information
collection.content:
The Company collects personal information to the extent necessary for the following purposes:
・Response to inquiries
・Provision of services
・Contract fulfillment
・Marketing activities

usage.title: 2. Purpose of Use of Personal Information
usage.content:
The Company uses collected personal information for the following purposes:
・Response to customer inquiries
・Provision and operation of services
・Distribution of newsletters
・Service improvement and development

thirdParty.title: 3. Disclosure to Third Parties
thirdParty.content: The Company will not provide personal information to third parties without customer consent, except when required by law.

security.title: 4. Security Measures
security.content: The Company implements reasonable security measures against risks such as loss, destruction, alteration, and leakage of personal information, and strives for proper management.

disclosure.title: 5. Disclosure, Correction, Deletion
disclosure.content: Customers can request disclosure, correction, deletion, etc. of their personal information held by the Company. Please contact us via the inquiry form.

contact.title: 6. Contact
contact.content: For inquiries regarding the handling of personal information, please contact us via the inquiry form.
